org.mozilla.browser
Class MozillaExecutor

java.lang.Object
  org.mozilla.browser.MozillaExecutor

public class MozillaExecutor
extends Object

Executor for running jobs on mozilla thread.

Method Detail

isMozillaThread

public static boolean isMozillaThread()
Returns true, if the current thread is the mozilla thread, that is a thread where (most of) the mozilla code runs.

On OSX, mozilla thread is the AppKit thread.

Returns:
true if current thread is mozilla thread

mozSyncExec

public static void mozSyncExec(Runnable task)
                        throws MozillaRuntimeException
Synchronously executes a task on mozilla thread.

An exception caught during task exception, is re-thrown wrapped in a subclass of the RuntimeException, so its explicit handling is not enforced.

Parameters:
task - task to be executed
Throws:
MozillaRuntimeException - internal error if occurred

mozSyncExec

public static void mozSyncExec(RunnableEx task)
                        throws MozillaException
Synchronously executes a task on mozilla thread.

An exception caught during task exception, is re-thrown wrapped in a MozillaException, so its explicit handling is enforced.

Parameters:
task - task to be executed
Throws:
MozillaException - wrapped exception thrown from RunnableEx.run() or internal error if occurred

mozSyncExec

public static <V> V mozSyncExec(Callable<V> task)
                     throws MozillaException
Synchronously executes a task with result on mozilla thread.

An exception caught during task exception, is re-thrown wrapped in a MozillaException, so its explicit handling is enforced.

Type Parameters:
V - type of return value
Parameters:
task - task to be executed
Returns:
task return value
Throws:
MozillaException - wrapped exception thrown from Callable.call() or internal error if occurred

mozSyncExecQuiet

public static <V> V mozSyncExecQuiet(Callable<V> task)
                          throws MozillaRuntimeException
Synchronously and quietly executes a task with result on mozilla thread.

Possible exception is encapsulated into MozillaRuntimeException, so that it does not have to be handled explicitely in application logic.

Type Parameters:
V - type of return value
Parameters:
task - task to be executed
Returns:
task return value
Throws:
MozillaRuntimeException - wrapped exception thrown from Callable.call() or internal error if occurred.

mozAsyncExec

public static org.mozilla.browser.MozillaExecutor.MozCallable<Void> mozAsyncExec(Runnable task)
Asynchronously executes a task on mozilla thread.

Parameters:
task - task to be executed
Returns:
internal callable object , the task was wrapped into

mozPostponableSyncExec

public static void mozPostponableSyncExec(Runnable task)
Queues a task to be executed as soon as the mozilla is initialized.

Parameters:
task - task to be executed

public static void runPostponedPreInitTasks()

public static void swingSyncExec(Runnable task)
                          throws RuntimeException
Synchronously execute a task on swing thread. Possible exception is encapsulated into RuntimeException, so that it has to be handled explicitely in application logic.

Throws:
RuntimeException - error if occurred

                          throws Exception
